data.actual_result: It animates like if the option was toggling itself on.
data.short_description: The Privacy settings toggle animates weirdly when opening the long-press menu on servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Pick any server, preferably without acces to Server settings and change nickname so you can see the Provacy settings option without having to scroll down - Make sure that DMs from members of this server are *enabled* - Long-press on this server in the server list and observe closely the Privacy settings toggle
